thread.title: Lakers' Bronny James has amusing stat in common with Ben Simmons
thread.title_full: Lakers' Bronny James has amusing stat in common with Ben Simmons

author: Billy Heyen
title: Lakers' Bronny James has amusing stat in common with Ben Simmons
text:
Lakers’ Bronny James has amusing stat in common with Ben Simmons
Bronny James and Ben Simmons have something in common. For fans of LeBron James and the Los Angeles Lakers, don't worry — that shouldn't be the case for long. But for a couple nights, the corners of NBA Twitter have laughed at the fact that Bronny and the mostly disappointing Simmons have one statistic in common. In Simmons' NBA career, he has made five 3-pointers. In Bronny's NBA career, he has made five 3-pointers. MORE: Is LeBron playing tonight? Bronny edges Simmons in percentage, having shot 5-for-22 (22.7) compared to Simmons' 5-for-36 (13.9). Of course, Bronny should soon surge past...
Read more at www.sportingnews.com
